message.content:
1. A randomized controlled trial was conducted.
2. The trial was conducted prospectively.
3. The trial aimed to compare the therapeutic effectiveness of two methods.
4. The two methods compared were switching bipolar radiofrequency ablation using cooled-wet electrodes and switching monopolar radiofrequency ablation using separable clustered electrodes.
5. The trial was conducted on patients with hepatocellular carcinomas.

messages.content:
Statement: A randomized controlled trial was conducted to prospectively compare the therapeutic effectiveness of switching bipolar (SB) radiofrequency ablation (RFA) using cooled-wet electrodes and switching monopolar (SM) RFA using separable clustered (SC) electrodes in patients with hepatocellular carcinomas (HCCs).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
